item.title: SMF 71 Subtype 1
item.description: How to use this documentation? Virtual fields Record fields Maps and sections SMF71PRO SMF71PAG Virtual fields Name Based on Description timestamp date time Record Timestamp boost_class fla Boost class is set at end of interval, valid only when zIIP boost and/or Speed boost is active: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process interval_in_milliseconds interval Interval duration in milliseconds Record fields Name Based on Description Type/Format date SMF71DTE Date of Record date time SMF71TME Time of Record time timestampÂ virtual date

item.description: Flags Map: SMF71PRO Based on: SMF71FLA Description Flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description cnv 0 Data converted from version 2 invalid_samples 1 Invalid samples to be skipped m3r 2 Record was written by RMF Monitor III ism 3 Interval was under SMF control rcl 4 SMF record converted to lower service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR.
